short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a quick meeting price indication to every Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a small Chrome extension that will add a new line to Google Calendar events showing the cost of the event. For this it will use an average wage, average employer charge and average context switching time. All of this is configurable in the plugin.
